# Load Data

## Data Sources

Use `Preferences.jl` to set the location of data files.

```{julia}
using Preferences
using VKCComputing

set_preferences!(VKCComputing,
    "airtable_dir"     => "/brewster/kevin/scratch",
    "mgx_analysis_dir" => "/grace/sequencing/processed/mgx/",
    "mgx_raw_dir"      => "/grace/sequencing/raw/mgx/rawfastq/",
    "readonly_pat"     => "patl4LYizNpcRq6cS.958d6be99d5ccb810f6b10d8e6510c6925a6ed8c9ee7a71235a04ac6f303a8c5",
    "readwrite_pat"    => "<hidden>")
```
